name: My 7000 Nightmares
description:
My 7000 Nightmares.

Continuing from where we left off in "My 6000 Horrors", you and your friend had
successfully stopped Spooky and her specimens from making a sharp grab for power, however she is not happy and has launched an attack of her own in an effort to stop you.  You must fight her off and survive, work with or against the other subjects in an attempt to survive and stop this invasion into your universe before it's too late.

--
The universe for an unknown reason has been broken and game characters are
flooding into your reality, it is your task to find out why and fix it.
The theme of these games is to release a new part of the story for every 1000 subs on my YouTube channel as a thank you to everyone who has supported me.  As I have now reached over 7000 subs I am pleased to release the 3rd game in my goal to getting 10k subscribers.

YouTuber:  Fellowplayer
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXzcduiD99hcDMhhCzByRiA
--
